messages.subject: Re: wordplay
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/5/99 10:56:16 PM, tn-k4of5@if.rmci.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/5/99 10:56:16 PM, tn-k4of5@... writes:

<< I can only assume that such an assumtion comes
of living in a country that can be often very slanted toward Christianity. >>

not so fast...

really it was just an observation of the wording that she used. for example,
if you say, "sometimes im glad im not a homeschooler." then, it also could
mean: usually (the rest of the time) you wish you were.

i have a natural interest in semantics and language usage and thought if the
underlying wish was for Christianity, i would remind her that God is always
waiting for us to come back to Him.....

erin
